Engine.​src.​textures.​ModelTexture
[XmlRoot("ModelTexture")]
[Serializable]
public
Engine.​src.​textures.​ModelTexture

Represents a texture and its caracteristics.  [BASIC] texturePath, rotation, selectedSize, index, numberOfRows, numberOfColumns, invertH, invertV.  [ANIMATION] life, numberOfAnimationRows, numberOfAnimationColumns, numberOfFrames.
